name: Wp simple Membership
author: Allah Noor

sections.description:
This plugin is used to create a wordpress Membership Website. Shortcodes can be used to create Login, Registration and My Profile page.

Demo And Docs

features :

  • Front end login page.
  • Front end Registration page.
  • Front end my profile page.
  • Front end Reset password page.
  • Redirect to a page of your choice after login.(Adminisrator will still reidrect to admin dashboard.)
  • Redirect to a page of you choice after user registration. Like thank-you page.
  • Send New user notification to admin only or user only or both or none.
  • Alot of actions and filters supported to change the behaviour like Form fields..

Translators === Available Languages =* English (Default)*
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Wp simple Membership from Plugins page
